ygData.subject: Re: Curiosity
ygData.msgSnippet: Firedrill pushed his hand off the ground to stand himself up. He looked out in the direction of Redhot, silently folding his arms in the process. Yeah, you

Firedrill pushed his hand off the ground to stand himself up. He looked
out in the direction of Redhot, silently folding his arms in the
process. "Yeah, you might get yourself injured, besides, if he needs
help he will call us. Cliffjumper's a scrapper." Firedrill stated,
fondness in his voice for the older Autobot.
